name: A Mushroom's Tale
description:
This is a vertical slice or demo of a concept. The game is not finished. That being said, you play as a child who finds a book in a toybox at their school, and upon opening it is sucked into a strange and beautiful world filled with mushroom people. You must find a way to escape and get home. This game is a point and click story for kids and nostalgic adults, and only needs a mouse to play. Enjoy!

A Mushroom's tale is the result of the combined efforts of 3 Mushie Mates! Yasemin and Isi are great, talented people and I love their work so here are their itch.io handles and everyone's twitter accounts! Go follow <3 

Alex M,  @magicmagpiegame

Isobel Archer, @isi_archer & https://isi-a.itch.io/

Yasemin Kuzu, @pr_crastination & https://pr-crastination.itch.io/

Please note that due to the time limits and the fact that this game is a demo, some features are not fully functional! This is a student game. The info button in the menu is not implemented yet and thus functionality is disabled.

Sounds Used:

Bees: https://freesound.org/people/tom_woysky/sounds/243011/

Birdy ambiance: https://freesound.org/people/petebuchwald/sounds/288899/

River sound: https://freesound.org/people/Pfannkuchn/sounds/459409/

Music: https://freesound.org/people/GoodByte/sounds/442911/

Characters talking:

https://freesound.org/people/Augdog/sounds/210211/
